pages.text: Affects all elemental spells. Elemental spells cooldown and mana cost are decreased by 10%, spell level increases by 1, spell range increases 10%, spell effect amplification increases a level and effect duration increases 10%. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_the_equinox)Path of the Equinox$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter is in tune with all the elements. Imbues onto the Equinox, available only if following the Path of the Equinox.
